pageContext.surface: Smooth. The side of rim is slightly pitted. Traces of light soil all over these pieces.

pageContext.associations: One of a Bronze Founder's Hoard of 16 socketed celts, 20 lumps of rough metal, 14 pieces of socketed celts, 14 small pieces of an earthenware pot, 4 pieeces of rim of burial urn, a pair of burial urn handles, 3 spearheads, 1 chape, and part of a socketed tool.
